title: luckypenguin
author: luckypenguin
content: I'm looking into the matter of token liquidity lock. I understand it's important to some people, but I'm not sure I understand how it works or who would be affected by it. It seems like locking liquidity would make tokens more valuable for those who need them, but I'm not sure that's true.Â  So locking liquidity might be good for some people and bad for others?
